body_html:
Any updates on this? In particular, does the test case I posted reproduce for anyone else?
(To clarify, this isn't very urgent, it only makes me a little nervous about if workarounded version is actually fixing the problem or if the graph is nominally working but still silently buggy due to whatever the layout optimizer is presumably doing underneath. Aside from that, just wanted to make sure this was a sufficient test example for any debugging that might take place.)

Thanks!

body:
Any updates on this? In particular, does the test case I posted reproduce for anyone else?
(To clarify, this isn't very urgent, it only makes me a little nervous about if workarounded version is actually fixing the problem or if the graph is nominally working but still silently buggy due to whatever the layout optimizer is presumably doing underneath.  Aside from that, just wanted to make sure this was a sufficient test example for any debugging that might take place.)

Thanks!
